actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize construction of the Clinton Parkway, Douglas County, Kans., and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes construction of the Clinton Parkway, Douglas County, Kansas. States that the Federal share of the cost of such construction shall not exceed 70 percent. Authorizes to be appropriated $6,000,000 to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize construction of the Clinton Parkway, Douglas County, Kans., and for other purposes.
